attributes.action: Promote a plant based diet and educate people on the consequences of their diets
attributes.additional_details: If we reduced greenhouse gas emissions are planet would strive more, as we have a growing population and it’s crutial we find a more sustainable way to live. Less people would be getting ill, less land would be taken up and people would have the correct nutrition in there diets if they were mainly plant based. It would be more productive and less resources would need to be used to produce this stock which would save money and allow farms to still profit if they made there products plants instead
attributes.background: Explaining how animal agriculture is having a massive impact on our environment and health. We could reduce NHS costs if people were more educated on there health and the consequences of there diets. We could reduce greenhouse gas emissions by approximately 75% if we all had a plant based diet.
